classic.name: Holy Church of Saint Demetrius

classic.description: Modest home & birthplace of Mustafa Kemal Atatürk, the founder of modern Turkey, offering tours.

classic.description: This Byzantine-era fortress features multiple towers & overlooks the city's acropolis.
